text: Lymphoma is a cancer of the lymphatic system. There are many types of lymphoma, including Hodgkin's lymphoma, non-Hodgkin lymphoma, primary central nervous system lymphoma, the B-cell lymphoma, and the hepatosplenic lymphoma. == Symptoms == * Larger-than-normal lymph nodes * Sweating at night * Fevers that happen often or do not get better * Weight loss * Fatigue (feeling tired) * Enlarged spleen * Enlarged liver == Treatment == Chemotherapy is often used for both Hodgkin's lymphoma and non-Hodgkin lymphoma. Radiotherapy may also be used. == References == Category:Medicine Category:Cancer C Category:Immunology Category:Lymphatic system
title: Lymphoma
